title: The City of Shells
description: Order of Tales is an atmospheric adventure comic set in a world called Overside.Teller Koark, the last member of an ancient society of story-collectors, has been given the task of finding one story whose importance will surpass all others. In seeking the Ascent of the Bone Ziggurat, Koark finds instead a strange being made of glass, and becomes involved in a secret conflict involving a centuries-old Machine Man, Black-bird warrior, and thousands of years of violent history.This book contains the first five chapters of the story as originally published online, and extra material.
author: Evan Dahm
